00010 #include "CTitle.h"
00011 #include "../sdl/CTimer.h"
00012 #include "../sdl/CVideoDriver.h"
00013 #include "vorticon/ai/CEGABitmap.h"
00014 #include "../graphics/effects/CColorMerge.h"
00015 #include "../graphics/effects/CPixelate.h"
00016 
00017 ////
00018 // Creation Routine
00019 ////
00020 CTitle::CTitle(std::vector<CObject*> &Objects, CMap &map) :
00021 m_objects(Objects),
00022 m_time(0),
00023 m_map(map)
00024 {}
00025 
00026 bool CTitle::init(int Episode)
00027 {
00028  CObject *p_object;
00029  SDL_Surface *pSurface;
00030  CBitmap *pBitmap;
00031  g_pTimer->ResetSecondsTimer();
00032  m_time = 10; // show the title screen for 10 secs.
00033  pSurface = g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface;
00034  if(!g_pVideoDriver->getSpecialFXConfig())
00035   g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(new CColorMerge(8));
00036  else
00037   g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(new CPixelate(8));
00038  
00039  if( (pBitmap = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("TITLE")) != NULL )
00040  {
00041   p_object = new CEGABitmap( &m_map, pSurface, pBitmap );
00042   p_object->setScrPos( 160-(pBitmap->getWidth()/2), 0 );
00043   m_objects.push_back(p_object);
00044  }
00045 
00046  if( (pBitmap = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("F1HELP")) != NULL )
00047  {
00048   pBitmap = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("F1HELP");
00049   p_object = new CEGABitmap( &m_map, pSurface, pBitmap );
00050 
00051   p_object->setScrPos( (Episode == 3) ? 128 : 96, 182 );
00052   m_objects.push_back(p_object);
00053  }
00054  
00055  m_map.changeTileArrayY(2, 15, 2, g_pGfxEngine->getTileMap(1).EmptyBackgroundTile());
00056 
00057  m_finished = false;
00058 
00059  return true;
00060 }
00061 
00062 ////
00063 // Process Routine
00064 ////
00065 void CTitle::process()
00066 {
00067  if( m_time == 0) m_finished = true;
00068  else m_time -= g_pTimer->HasSecElapsed();
00069 }
00070 
00071 ////
00072 // Cleanup Routine
00073 ////
00074 CTitle::~CTitle() {
00075  while( !m_objects.empty() )
00076   m_objects.pop_back();
00077 }
